name: Royal Heroes 3D
description:
Welcome, my Lord, to the cursed kingdom. A land plagued by black magic and creatures that crawl out of the darkness. Once this was a great kingdom. It could be great again. That's all up to you. Enter the world of Royal Heroes - a strategy game set in a world of fantasy and adventure.

Battle:
Click on cards to buy new heroes.
Drag them to the battlefield.
(Enemies can be dragged too - for debug purposes - units will switch sides if dropped on another team side)
Right Mouse Click - to open the skills menu.

Skills:
Left click to learn a new skill for the selected unit.
Cheat btns to get an extra level or points.
Right Click anywhere to close the window.
